## Description {#details}

Reverse path iterator.

This is an input iterator that iterates over the individual components in <em>path</em> in reverse order. The traversal order is exactly reversed from that of <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/path/const-iterator">const&#95;iterator</a></em>

Definition at line 99 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/path-h">Path.h</a>.
